Wonbin

Group (2024):
The CrewOne

Introduction

Wonbin is a South Korean singer under IST Entertainment. When he was still a trainee, Wonbin joined the survival show “THE ORIGIN – A, B, OR What?” but was eliminated in the fifth episode. However, he was eventually added to the debuting group ATBO after Yang Donghwa was disqualified.
